channel.title: Send someone to jail
channel.description:
Is there anyway someone can make something like this
::jail (playername)
only admins can do the command, and whos ever playername they put will send them to the jail in port sarim, and they will have to wait there for 10 mins, and they cant tele for 10 mins.
If anyone can do this that would be extremly cool. Please help Thanks!

item.title: Send someone to jail

item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

i have a emote teleports. find // EMOTETAB_SEC than add the code under one of the tabs, like this public void emoteYes() //home { if(wildyLevel <= 20 && !teleblock && !CheckInCombat() && teleATimer == 0) { tele(2734,3468); sendMessage("welcome home"); teleATimer = 30; } else if (wildyLevel > 20) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport out above level 20 Wilderness."); } else if (CheckInCombat()) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport in combat"); } else if (teleblock) { sendMessage("You are teleblocked!"); } }

item.title: Send someone to jail
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

yeah, hold on[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2008, 05:45:11 PM[/size][hr]if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 3015; c.teleportToY = 3194; c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage("You Have been thrown to JAIL!"); c.sendMessage("I would say sorry if I were you"); c.teleblock = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (command.startsWith("unjail") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 1) { String name = command.substring(7); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 3093; c.teleportToY = 3962; c.teleblock = false; c.sendMessage("hahaha run little piggy!!!!!"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } than under case 9154 add this so they can’t logif ((absX >= 3009 && absX <= 3198 && absY >=3023 && absY <=3203 ) || (absX >= 0000 && absX <= 0000 && absY >=0000 && absY <=0000)) { sendMessage("You cannot Logg out here!"); } else {
